trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> allows you a lot of freedom in configuring your system. This freedom can be confusing if you do not understand how properties work. You also have the option of not setting any properties and instead using the <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> defaults, which are tuned for a single-user embedded system.
